PErceptor/nightlight

Perceptor waited patiently til the program  finished. Nightlights condition 
remains stable by now

-----Original Message----- 
From: Super Cyclonus
Sent: Wednesday, December 15, 2010 2:12 AM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: The Awakening/nighlight

> <OLD>
>
> The predacon program checked carfully checked the program as if it checked
> every step looking for an anormality

So far the program seemed to be going as expected, the computer
continued to show progress.

5% . . . 10% . . . 15% . . .

The computer continued to mark the progress as the doctors watched.
"It's working." Bump said as he watched the progress bar creep across.

Legacy monitored Nightlight's vital signs, "So far the patient appears
to be stable." intoned nuetrally.

"It's still Predacon." Santon said mistrustfully. "I wait till the end
before I start cheering."

Legacy nodded, "Agreed. It is premature to asume succes until the
program has completed its task."

Bump frowned but said nothing.

35% . . . 40% . . . 45% . . .

(TAG)

Preston
